mapper.select: SELECT m.mem_id, cm.message, cr.chatroom_num, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM chatmessage sub_cm WHERE sub_cm.chatroom_num = cr.chatroom_num AND sub_cm.read_check = 1) AS read_count FROM chatroom cr LEFT OUTER JOIN member m ON cr.mem_num = m.mem_num LEFT OUTER JOIN chatmessage cm ON cr.chatroom_num = cm.chatroom_num LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT chatroom_num, MAX(send_date) max_send_date FROM chatmessage GROUP BY chatroom_num) latest_msg ON cm.chatroom_num = latest_msg.chatroom_num AND cm.send_date = latest_msg.max_send_date ORDER BY cm.send_date DESC
SELECT message, send_date, read_check, mem_num, mem_id FROM chatmessage JOIN member USING(mem_num) WHERE chatroom_num=#{chatroom_num} ORDER BY send_date ASC
